getFriends(String) - Static method in class stratego.server.DBManager
this runs a query to return the name and online status of every user that has a friend relationship with the current user.

L

login(String, String) - Static method in class stratego.server.DBManager

R

requestFriend(String, String) - Static method in class stratego.server.DBManager
this makes a request that will create a new row in the friend table with the user's id as the first element and the friends id as the second and the accepted value as false
